get.description: Returns a paginated list of works

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of extra fields to include

parameters.name: items.locations.locationType
parameters.description: Filter by the LocationType of items on the retrieved works

parameters.name: workType
parameters.description: Filter by the workType of the searched works

parameters.name: aggreations
parameters.description: What aggregated data in correlation to the results should we return.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Which field to sort the results on

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: The order that the results should be returned in.

parameters.name: production.dates.to
parameters.description:
Return all works with a production date before and including this date.

Can be used in conjunction with `production.dates.from` to create a range.

parameters.name: production.dates.from
parameters.description:
Return all works with a production date after and including this date.

Can be used in conjunction with `production.dates.to` to create a range.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description:
Full-text search query, which will OR supplied terms by default.

The following special characters can be used to change the search behaviour:

- " wraps a number of tokens to signify a phrase for searching

To search for any of these special characters, they should be escaped with \.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page to return from the result list

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of works to return per page (default: 10)

parameters.name: _queryType
parameters.description: Which query should we use search the works? Used predominantly for internal testing of relevancy. Considered Unstable.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of extra fields to include

IdentifierType.description: Relates a Identifier to a particular authoritative source identifier scheme: for example, if the identifier is MS.49 this property might indicate that this identifier has its origins in the Wellcome Library's CALM archive management system.

duration.description: The playing time for audiovisual works, in seconds.

items.description: An individual work such as a text, archive item or picture; or a grouping of individual works (so, for instance, an archive collection counts as a work, as do all the series and individual files within it).  Each work may exist in multiple instances (e.g. copies of the same book).  N.B. this is not synonymous with \"work\" as that is understood in the International Federation of Library Associations and Institutions' Functional Requirements for Bibliographic Records model (FRBR) but represents something lower down the FRBR hierarchy, namely manifestation. Groups of related items are also included as works because they have similar properties to the individual ones.

value.description: The value of the thing. e.g. an identifier

items.description: A unique system-generated identifier that governs interaction between systems and is regarded as canonical within the Wellcome data ecosystem.

Work.description: An individual work such as a text, archive item or picture; or a grouping of individual works (so, for instance, an archive collection counts as a work, as do all the series and individual files within it).  Each work may exist in multiple instances (e.g. copies of the same book).  N.B. this is not synonymous with \"work\" as that is understood in the International Federation of Library Associations and Institutions' Functional Requirements for Bibliographic Records model (FRBR) but represents something lower down the FRBR hierarchy, namely manifestation. Groups of related items are also included as works because they have similar properties to the individual ones.

WorkType.description: A broad, top-level description of the form of a work: namely, whether it is a printed book, archive, painting, photograph, moving image, etc.
